(Simplified: 讷)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 内 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 内 [ nèi ] inside
①語言遲鈍：木訥。口訥。訥訥(形容說話遲鈍)。
訥訥 [ nè nè ]: (of speech) indistinct; mumbling; hesitating
訥河 [ nè hé ]: Nehe county level city in Qiqihar 齐齐哈尔 , Heilongjiang
訥河市 [ nè hé shì ]: Nehe county level city in Qiqihar 齐齐哈尔 , Heilongjiang
(Simplified: 讷)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 内 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 讷

Main pronunciation 主要发音: nè

Original meaning 本义: Meaning slow of speech.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 木訥 mù nè (simple-minded)

Importance by frequency 常用频率:

Shuowen 说文解字: 言難也從言從內

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 訥 from mouth-speak (讠)訁 yán and phonetic inner-flap-door (内)內 nèi simp 讷.

訥字的基本解释

訥
nè
见“讷”。

訥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nè］
［《廣韻》内骨切，入没，泥。］
亦作“呐1”。“讷1”的繁体字。
(1)出言迟钝；口齿笨拙。
(2)忍而少言。
(3)吞吞吐吐地说。
(4)指质直之言。
(5)河豚腹中的脂肪。

訥字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　訥； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1150第09
【唐韻】內骨切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】奴骨切，?嫩入聲。【說文】言難也。【玉篇】遲鈍也。【廣韻】謇訥也。【論語】君子欲訥於言而敏於行。【關尹子·九藥篇】窮天下之辯者，不在辯而在訥。　又木名。【本草釋名】盧會，一名訥會。　又【集韻】或作呐。【史記·李將軍傳】廣訥口少言。【漢書】作呐。師古曰：呐亦訥字。　又【集韻】亦作詘。【前漢·曹參傳】訥於文辭。【史記】作詘。　又【集韻】張滑切，音鵽。言不辯也。　又【韻會小補】叶諾悅切，音涅。【老子·道德經】大巧若拙，大辯若訥。　【正字通】通作㕯。【字彙補】籀文作?。

Basic explanation of words
Ne
nè

Ne
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nè］
["Guangyun" the internal bone is cut, into the sink, and mud. ]
Also known as "Na 1". The traditional characters of "Ne1".
(1) Slow speech; clumsy speech.
(2) Be patient and speak less.
(3) Hesitatingly said.
(4) Refers to straight words.
(5) Fat in the abdomen of puffer fish.
Ne

[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　ne; Kangxi strokes: 11; page number: page 1150 09
[Tang Yun] Internal bone cutting [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Slave bone cutting, tender into the sound. [Speaking] It's hard to speak. [Jade articles] Sluggish too. [Guang Yun] Jian Ne Ye. [The Analects] Gentlemen want to be indifferent to words but quick to deeds. 【Guan Yinzi·Nine Medicines】The debater of the poor world is not arguing but arguing.　Also wooden name. [Materia Medica name] Lu Hui, a Ne Hui.　[Jiyun] or Zuona. [Historical Records · General Li's Biography] Wide and quietly speaking. [Hanshu] Zuo Na. Shi Gu said: "Na Yenne".　[Jiyun] also made a confession. [Previous Han · Cao Shen Biography] Neyu Wenci. [Historical Records] Make a quip.　[Jiyun] Zhang Huaqie, sound is flamboyant. It doesn't matter.　[Yunhui Xiaobu] Ye Nuoyue cut, Yinni. [Laozi·Tao De Jing] It's clever and clumsy, but it's arrogant.　【Zhengzitong】Pass for 㕯. 【Word Supplement】Qiwen Composing?.
